examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I would like to speak with somebody about our billing please. Many thanks

Describe your issue: Hi! I did not know how to contact you earlier. I know this is not an “issue with Canva” with I just could not find another way to contact you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, how do I call you?. I like to know if you have a plane for people on SSI. I do not understand this lite plane?

Describe your issue: HI,
in my tool box under animation option call simple not available why is that?

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: Hi I have been in contact with you before without you having given feedback .. It takes about SEK 100 every month from you, without me having an active account with you! It is deducted from card number ending in 0853. Name: Sebastian Kopp Would have appreciated if you could come back with an answer

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there,

We are having some issues with our Canva <NAME> and there is a lot of confusion. 

Can you please contact me within working hours for New Zealand (8am - 5pm) on +<NUMBER>.

Thank you,
<NAME>

I've been trying to reply to you via email, someone called W3 Criss but not had any replies for months.  I've had the same issue with you for half a year now!  Please get back to me.

<NAME>

i wish to join the affiliate program

Thank you,
Jessie

Describe your issue: <NAME>>ID-tqtyj7 

HI <NAME>, thanks for your reply! As per what you mentioned, please put us on the annual subscription ($119.40). Greatly appreciate your help.
What do you need help with?: My friend forget his email

Describe your issue: Hi there! I made a typo with my business care!

Describe your issue: HI, you've created a beautiful app. thank you.

Describe your issue: Hi, I’m on an iPad Pro with the app... struggling to use it at all, as if I scroll through my presentation, for more than 1 slide or so, it reloads and takes me back to the beginning... which is super irritating...

Any ideas?

Thanks,
<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi,

It looks like we were overcharged on our bill this year. Can someone from accounts please get in touch?

Describe your issue: Hi there I'm looking to use my Canva credit for my up coming renewal. Please advise,

Describe your issue: Hi, I have this name under switch team. badzsofljj8.
It is really suspisious. Possible to check what is that?

Kind  regards

<NAME>

I'm having a problem with purchasing Canva Pro. I'm using MasterCard and it has funds. I get SMS on my phone for an account balance checks and everything is okay.
Can you please solve this?

Regards,
<NAME>.

Describe your issue: Hi guys, I have already emailed you yesterday. The issue has not been fixed yet. I cannot use any pictures on any of my templates. Could you please check it? Thank you!

Describe your issue: Hi, our trial didn't start and we already got the confirmation email that it has started

Describe your issue: Hi, My daughter accidently signed up for this under my account. I did not authorise this

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I am not able to see where it is mentioned that my account has 5 teammates, can you guide me there please?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi. i don’t remember signing up with you guys? Can i cancel the subscription? thank you. <EMAIL>
What do you need help with?: Hi I thought I was on Canva Pro but I’m not sure, can someone advise me please. Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi i am contacting regarding pricing

What kind of problem?: Other

we have started our pro account trial with the bank information. But we still can't use that. Please help us with that issue.

Describe your issue: Hi, 
You are overcharging me, in almost R$ 600,00.  I want my money back. Please call me, or answer. Otherwise I'll have to call justice

What did you have a problem with?: Canva Pro

Describe your issue: Hi there I got an email about a subscription but I never signed up for one

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi so far on my account, there are two class, I would like to rename one of the class, how can I do? Thanks!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I’m thinking of subscribing to the Canva Pro. Please could you answer a few queries I have. Which agency do you get the stock photos from? also, I’m about to start a community magazine, would the images be ok to publish? I will be the sole user. Thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, how i can get my homepage for canvo pro at my iphone....

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi guys, i have just received a lifetime subscription to "Crello" which looks exactly like Canva. Do you offer loyalty discounts to your customers, or should i catch that deal?

Best,
<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi team, 
I work for a reseller and out card is on a few accounts for Canva. We received some unknown bills recently. Can you contact me to discuss ASAP? Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there.

Just wondering why Canva home or designs are just showing half of the screen? Is it the way it is or it's just my phone?

Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, my Canva is being extremely slow. Are you having problems at the moment?

What did you have a problem with?: Canva Pro

Describe your issue: Hi there. We have been billed for £107.88 on the 18th November 2020. But we are unaware of any purchases. Please could we resolve this ASAP. Many thanks, <NAME>.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there, I'm not sure if this is the right place to send this. But I have some questions regarding upgrading to Canva pro. If I could correspond with a representative, I would greatly appreciate it! Thank you!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there, there seems to be a charge associated with my account. I have not opted for a pro account. Please can you review.

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: Hi, the app is magnificent but for 2 days all the actions I do are slow or jerky: for example when I zoom in on an image or when I write etc. etc. Please help me and answer me. Thanks!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there, our canva bill suddenly skyrocketed and I need to understand why. Many thanks,
BGS

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I just noticed I've been double-billed for Canva Pro since November. Can someone look into this for me?

Describe your issue: Hi, 
My issues still hasn't been resolved. I am due to start paying for my subscription but feel like cancelling because of it. Please resolve. Your support team marked issue #JTP-<NUMBER>as resolved without resolving it. 

Please help.

Thanks,

<NAME>

Describe your issue: Hi, I have some problems with the returning of money in my account.

Describe your issue: Hi, we are in need our your w-9 for tax purposes this year. Can you please share with me at your earliest convenience.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi,

I still have problems using Canva,NOTHING has changed since the last message i sent to you, and i really need it for professional purposes. Can someone please look into it?

thanks,
<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there, I want to change my billing date from the 31st of the month to the 3rd please. Can you support with this?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: HI - I am looking to find out how to wording fit on an organic rainbow arch. Help, please! :)

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi! I can't reactivate my PRO account.

Describe your issue: Hi we want to change our billing date to 4th of every month.

Describe your issue: Hi there, how do I find out please how much of my (free) account storage I'm using? I'd like to know before I hit the limit. Many thanks, Pauline <EMAIL>

Describe your issue: Billing:-
Hi Sirs,
I'm unable to purchase the upgrade.
Please let me know how to deal with this.

Thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, From last so many days I was trying to become a pro member but every time I am not able to complete the transaction process.  Please help.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I have a canva Pro account which I believe allows me up to 4 users, however, I seem to be being charged for the extra accounts?

Could you please advise on this situation?
What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: hi to make a brochure?
What kind of problem is there ?: Other Describe your problem: Hi I just made a notification but I solved it thank you I bothered :))

Describe your issue: Hi there, I actually just have a suggestion. Could you add color block options for the shirts and add polos please?

That would be super awesome! 
= D

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I don't have a specific issue per se, I am just desperately trying to find out the difference between Canva Pro and Canva Lite (which I pay $6.95 for).  This info is just no where to be found. Thanks so much! 
Christy Rucker

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, 
I've had my Canva account for like 2 years. I recently accepted to join a team on canvas, and all of a sudden all my years of work disappear. I checked everyone, it's almost as if I made a brand new account.

Describe your issue: Hi My activation email gives me a 403 message when I click it

Thanks so much <NAME>

Thank you!

hope you can help

thanks,
<NAME>
